name: CDexPWK01AttachmentReportTypeCodeValueSet
title: CDex PWK01 Attachment Report Type Code Value Set
description: In addition to using LOINC attachment codes, a payer may request for additional information from the provider to support a prior authorization request using X12's PWK01 Attachment Report Type Code.  Note that the PWK01 codes will not be published in due to X12 IP restrictions.
